t: Amazon.com: : All Departments
s: Amazon Go is a new kind of store featuring the world’s most advanced shopping technology. No lines, no checkout – just grab and go! Watch the video: amazon.com/go

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon Go - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Amazon described Go stores to have used several technologies, including computer vision, deep learning algorithms, and sensor fusion for the purchase, checkout, and payment steps associated with a retail transaction, which was later revealed to be supported remotely by a team of people in India.

t: Amazon to scrap its Go Grocery store branding, close Redmond location | The Seattle Times
s: May 19, 2021 - Amazon’s other Go Grocery store, on Capitol Hill, will remain open and will be rebranded to Amazon Fresh, the company’s midpriced grocery brand, Golden said.

t: Amazon rebrands Amazon Go Grocery to Amazon Fresh, closes Seattle-area store near Microsoft HQ – GeekWire
s: May 18, 2021 - The news: Amazon is renaming its Amazon Go Grocery brand to "Amazon Fresh" and closing its Amazon Go Grocery store in Redmond, Wash., near Microsoft's

t: Amazon rebranding Amazon Go Grocery, according to report | Chain Store Age
s: December 20, 2024 - Amazon is renaming its Amazon Go Grocery store brand to “Amazon Fresh,” reported GeekWire, and closing its Amazon Go Grocery store near Microsoft’s headquarters in Redmond, Wash.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Chenfeng Store about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal to receive the refund. Amazon is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, consumers should ...

t: Amazon Fresh needs to find its identity
s: March 9, 2025 - In my last post on Whole Foods, ... their locations, and brand. Over four years and 60-plus new stores later I do not share that enthusiasm for Amazon Fresh store format without major changes....

t: Amazon.com: goop

t: Number of Amazon Go locations in the USA in 2025 | ScrapeHero
s: 3 weeks ago - There are 17 Amazon Go locations in the United States as of May 14, 2025. The state/territory with the most number of Amazon Go locations in the US is Washington with 8 locations, which is 47% of all Amazon Go locations in America.

t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 1 week ago - Calzedonia just launched a swimwear collection on Amazon featuring unique, colorful one-pieces, bikinis and cover-ups that are great for the beach or pool.

t: KICIMPRO Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Kicimpro | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Kicimpro about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Kicimpro is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Amazon.com: GOOSH
s: GOOSH brand story GOOSH vision: make your holiday happier! GOOSH brand provides longer replacement service since 2020. When consumers have any quality problems within one year of purchasing products, we will provide you with the best customer service, so that you can buy with confidence.

t: Amazon launches new Amazon Saver private label to help shoppers save, take on Walmart, Target - ABC News
s: September 11, 2024 - Tech and retail giant Amazon has launched Amazon Saver, a new no-frills private label for groceries, plus new discounts for Prime members.

t: 21 Women-Owned Brands Available on Amazon 2025
s: March 15, 2025 - During Women's History Month (and beyond), support women entrepreneurs and creatives by shopping women-owned brands—and these happen to be available on Amazon.

t: Brand Stores: Kostenlos eine Markenseite auf Amazon erstellen | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores helfen Ihnen dabei, die Markenbekanntheit zu steigern, indem Sie Ihre Marke und Ihren Produktkatalog unter Ihrer eigenen Amazon-Webadresse präsentieren. Sie können einen Brand Store ohne zusätzliche Kosten erstellen – ohne dass eine Programmierung notwendig ist.
